data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 3,175 believers in As-Sulaymaniyah, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of As-Sulaymaniyah, Iraq
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in As-Sulaymaniyah, Iraq to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 488 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of As-Sulaymaniyah. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of As-Sulaymaniyah, Iraq.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Kurd, Central people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Pour your Spirit out on the 1,552,000 citizens of As-Sulaymaniyah, Iraq, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of As-Sulaymaniyah.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, help the 3,175 believers in As-Sulaymaniyah to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,548,825 lost friends and neighbors.
